caption:
This photograph captures an early morning fishing scene on a serene, vast body of water. Two boats are featured prominently in the image. The boat on the left is a white and blue motorboat filled with several individuals engaged in fishing activities; one person is actively casting a fishing rod while another is holding a net, presumably ready to catch any fish that are reeled in. 

The second boat, predominantly green with a white section near the bow, includes two individuals who appear to be tending to fishing poles. Both boats are sitting low on the calm water, indicating a quiet and tranquil environment, with no visible waves or much movement on the surface of the water.

The background is a gradient of soft purple transforming into a light blue, suggesting the time of day is either dawn or dusk. The horizon is subtly defined, blending the water with the sky in a hazy, soft focus that conveys a sense of peacefulness and isolation from the busyness of everyday life.

Overall, the composition of the photograph, with its muted colors and soft lighting, emphasizes a tranquil and reflective outdoor activity, offering a glimpse into a moment of leisure and connection with nature.
title: Salmon fishermen at evening fishing the Strait of Juan de Fuca
